concept.title: Format and Method for Submission
concept.shortdesc: The syllabus should explain the required file formats for assignments and policies on how to take tests and quizzes.

conbody.p:
The relevant information for policies on the format and method of assignment submissions could be included as a subsection to the assignments subsection (in the policies section) and includes:
A statement that explains your policies on how to take tests and quizzes
A statement that explains your policies for file submissions

example.title: Example
example.p: You will take all quizzes and tests through Canvas. You must submit all projects, papers, and exercises as a PDF document through Canvas unless otherwise directed in class.
